title: Felix Okpara proud to represent Nigeria and Chattanooga in NCAA Tournament | Video | local3news.com
text:
Felix Okpara proud to represent Nigeria and Chattanooga in NCAA Tournament
- Updated
Okpara moved to Chattanooga from Nigeria and played his junior season for Hamilton Heights. Now, he's back in Tennessee as a major contributor for the Vols heading into the NCAA Tournament.
As featured on
